unnormalised: Hey guys, return policies are crucial, no? Remember that time Meena from Chennai returned her saree after Onam? It was a hassle! I feel like 7 days is too short sometimes, especially for online shopping. 14 days feels better, like Flipkart used to offer. What if something's damaged during Delhivery transport? Needs clarity, yaar! Otherwise, no one wants to end up with unsold biryani, right?
normalised: Hey guys, return policies are crucial, no? Remember that time Meena from Chennai returned her saree after Onam? It was a hassle! I feel like seven days is too short sometimes, especially for online shopping. fourteen days feels better, like F L I P K A R T used to offer. What if something's damaged during D E L H I V E R Y transport? Needs clarity, yaar! Otherwise, no one wants to end up with unsold biryani, right?
